title: Morannon (5R102)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of the first [Sauron] Orc played at site 4T is -3. Shadow: Spot 2 [Sauron] Orcs and discard 4 cards from hand to draw 3 cards. Discard this condition.
Lore:	The black gate of Mordor was called the Morannon.
Rarity:	R
